column4: problem, smb://winXP was working perfectly but not any more...
problem, smb://winXP was working perfectly but not now
Try using a command line smb client and see if it gives you an error.
good idea, how?
I don't know of any, let me ask some other friends.
thanks a lot
do sudo apt-get install smbclient
No problem.
I have already installed... I can run smbclient now
all right, try accessing that share, then.
it connects OK
Ok....odd.....maybe its a problem with the browser then?
Or maybe the hostname was changed
I know what's the problem now: NETBIOS hostname
smbclient //server/shared DOES NOT WORK, but smbclient //192.168.2.1/shared works OK
oh, all right.
thanks for your help
no problem
do you know how the hostname ATLAS can be associated with its IP?
sorry...dunno.
ok, it's all right
